001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.buildinfo;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
004import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.datetime.CoreDateTimeUtils;
005import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.datetime.DateTimeTriplet;
006import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.DumpUtils;
007import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.PropertiesUtils;
008
009import java.util.ArrayList;
010import java.util.Collections;
011import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.NavigableMap;
014import java.util.SequencedMap;
015
016/**
017 * Implementation of {@link BuildInfo} with build-information that is loaded from properties-file,
018 * that is expected to be at classpath as a resource with path: <pre>{@code
019 * /META-INF/maven/'project-group'/'project-artifact'/maven-project.properties
020 * }</pre>
021 * ... where <ul>
022 *     <li>{@code 'project-group'} - maven-project group</li>
023 *     <li>{@code 'project-artifact'} - maven-project artifact</li>
024 * </ul>
025 */
026public class MavenBuildInfo implements BuildInfo {
027
028    /**
029     * Property-name that holds the value of maven-project group  ({@code <groupId>}-tag in {@code pom.xml})
030     */
031    private final static String PROP_NAME__PROJECT_GROUP = "maven-project.group";
032
033    /**
034     * Property-name that holds the value of maven-project group  ({@code <artifactId>}-tag in {@code pom.xml})
035     */
036    private final static String PROP_NAME__PROJECT_ARTIFACT = "maven-project.artifact";
037
038    /**
039     * Property-name that holds the value of maven-project group  ({@code <version>}-tag in {@code pom.xml})
040     */
041    private final static String PROP_NAME__PROJECT_VERSION = "maven-project.version";
042
043    /**
044     * Property-name that represents the minimal JDK-version to use this library
045     */
046    private final static String PROP_NAME__MINIMAL_JAVA_VERSION = "minimal.java.version";
047
048
049    /**
050     * Property-name that represents the date-time when the project of this library was built.
051     * <hr/>
052     * The format of string-value corresponds to {@link java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter#ISO_INSTANT ISO_INSTANT},
053     * which is also available in build-property {@code "maven.build.timestamp.format"}.
054     */
055    private final static String PROP_NAME__PROJECT_BUILD_DATE_TIME = "maven-project.build-date-time";
056
057    private final String projectGroup;
058    private final String projectArtifact;
059    private final NavigableMap<String, String> mvnPropsMap;
060    private final String resourcePath;
061
062    private final DateTimeTriplet buildDateTime;
063    private final List<String> loadingErrors = new ArrayList<>();
064
065    /**
066     * Loading the build-information from properties-file, whose resource-path
067     * depends on passed {@code mavenProjectGroup} and {@code mavenProjectArtifact}
068     *
069     * @param mavenProjectGroup maven-project group ({@code <groupId>}-tag in {@code pom.xml} of maven-project)
070     * @param mavenProjectArtifact maven-project artifact ({@code <artifactId>}-tag in {@code pom.xml} of maven-project)
071     */
072    public MavenBuildInfo(String mavenProjectGroup, String mavenProjectArtifact) {
073        if (StringUtils.isBlank(mavenProjectGroup)) {
074            throw new IllegalArgumentException("'mavenProjectGroup' must not be blank");
075        }
076        if (StringUtils.isBlank(mavenProjectArtifact)) {
077            throw new IllegalArgumentException("'mavenProjectArtifact' must not be blank");
078        }
079        this.projectGroup = mavenProjectGroup.trim();
080        this.projectArtifact = mavenProjectArtifact.trim();
081        this.resourcePath = String.format(
082            "/META-INF/maven/%s/%s/maven-project.properties",
083            mavenProjectGroup, mavenProjectArtifact
084        );
085        this.mvnPropsMap = PropertiesUtils.propsMapResource(resourcePath);
086        this.buildDateTime = parseBuildDateTime();
087        checkForErrors();
088
089    }
090
091    private DateTimeTriplet parseBuildDateTime() {
092        if (mvnPropsMap.containsKey(PROP_NAME__PROJECT_BUILD_DATE_TIME)) {
093            errorMsg(String.format("no property '%s' to get the build date-time value",
094                PROP_NAME__PROJECT_BUILD_DATE_TIME));
095            return null;
096        }
097        try {
098            return CoreDateTimeUtils.dtt(mvnPropsMap.get(PROP_NAME__PROJECT_BUILD_DATE_TIME));
099        } catch (Exception ex) {
100            errorMsg(String.format("could not parse the property '%s' to get the build date-time value - %s",
101                PROP_NAME__PROJECT_BUILD_DATE_TIME, ex.getMessage()));
102            return null;
103        }
104    }
105
106    private void checkForErrors() {
107        if (this.mvnPropsMap.isEmpty()) {
108            errorMsg(String.format(
109                "loaded props-map is empty - most probably the resource '%s' is not available",
110                this.resourcePath
111            ));
112            return;
113        }
114        String projectGroupValue = this.mvnPropsMap.get(PROP_NAME__PROJECT_GROUP);
115        if (!this.projectGroup.equals(projectGroupValue)) {
116            errorMsg(String.format(
117                "value of maven-project group '%s' in resource '%s' does not equal to expected value '%s'",
118                this.projectGroup, this.resourcePath, projectGroupValue
119            ));
120        }
121        String projectArtifactValue = this.mvnPropsMap.get(PROP_NAME__PROJECT_ARTIFACT);
122        if (!this.projectArtifact.equals(projectArtifactValue)) {
123            errorMsg(String.format(
124                "value of maven-project artifact '%s' in resource '%s' does not equal to expected value '%s'",
125                this.projectArtifact, this.resourcePath, projectArtifactValue
126            ));
127        }
128        if (StringUtils.isBlank(this.getProjectVersion())) {
129            errorMsg(String.format(
130                "value of maven-project version (property '%s') is blank - most probably the resource '%s' is corrupted",
131                PROP_NAME__PROJECT_VERSION, this.resourcePath
132            ));
133        }
134    }
135
136    private void errorMsg(String errorMsg) {
137        this.loadingErrors.add(errorMsg);
138    }
139
140    @Override
141    public String getProjectGroup() {
142        return this.projectGroup;
143    }
144
145    @Override
146    public String getProjectArtifact() {
147        return this.projectArtifact;
148    }
149
150    @Override
151    public NavigableMap<String, String> getProjectProps() {
152        return Collections.unmodifiableNavigableMap(mvnPropsMap);
153    }
154
155    @Override
156    public String getResourcePath() {
157        return this.resourcePath;
158    }
159
160    @Override
161    public String getProjectVersion() {
162        return this.mvnPropsMap.get(PROP_NAME__PROJECT_VERSION);
163    }
164
165    @Override
166    public DateTimeTriplet getBuildDateTime() {
167        return this.buildDateTime;
168    }
169
170    @Override
171    public String getMinimalJavaVersion() {
172        return this.mvnPropsMap.get(PROP_NAME__MINIMAL_JAVA_VERSION);
173    }
174
175    @Override
176    public List<String> getLoadingErrors() {
177        return Collections.unmodifiableList(this.loadingErrors);
178    }
179
180    @Override
181    public String toString() {
182        return DumpUtils.dumpAsYamlTxt(this);
183    }
184}
